thread.section_title: Hotel de Seine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pefrect location and great staff
thread.title_full: Pefrect location and great staff - Review of Hotel de Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah W
title: Pefrect location and great staff
text: We picked this hotel for it's central location and it was perfect. It was so easy to walk around or even close enough to hope on the metro for longer distances. The staff we extremely friendly and helpful. They helped arrange an early morning taxi for us to catch our flight out. The room was very comfortable and cute.
